options.content:
Other Globus Task Statistics

This dashboard provides a summary of task information for science registry tagging, organizations, and countries, as well as volume and counts of tasks.
All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND meta.ip_version:4
meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND meta.ip_version:6

meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ( _exists_:meta.scireg.src.org_name  OR _exists_:meta.scireg.dst.org_name  ) AND NOT ( _exists_:meta.scireg.src.org_name  AND _exists_:meta.scireg.dst.org_name  ) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

options.content: Tasks with only one end tagged in Science Registry

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ( _exists_:meta.scireg.src.org_name  AND _exists_:meta.scireg.dst.org_name  ) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

options.content: Tasks with both ends tagged in Science Registry

title: What are the current Globus task summary statistics?
